rentalApproved.title: Rental Request Approved
rentalApproved.message: The customer's rental request has been approved successfully. The system will notify the customer to make payment.
steps: Wait for customer payment
Check payment status in the "Payment" tab
Prepare item for delivery
Contact customer via chat if you have any questions

rentalRejected.title: Rental Request Rejected
rentalRejected.message: The rental request has been rejected successfully. The system will notify the customer with the specified reason.
steps: Customer will be notified about the rejection
Check other rental requests in your list
Consider updating product information if necessary

paymentConfirmed.title: Payment Confirmed
paymentConfirmed.message: The customer's payment has been confirmed successfully. You can now prepare and ship the item.
steps: Prepare item for delivery
Update delivery status in the "Delivery/Return" tab
Add tracking number when shipped
Contact customer if you have additional delivery information

deliveryStatusUpdated.title: Delivery Status Updated
deliveryStatusUpdated.message: Delivery status has been updated to "{status}" successfully. The customer will be notified.
steps: Customer will be notified about the status update
Track package status via tracking number
Contact customer if there are delivery issues
Wait for delivery confirmation from customer

rentalCancelled.title: Rental Cancelled Successfully
rentalCancelled.message: Your rental has been cancelled successfully.
steps: Refund will be processed within 3-5 business days
Check refund status in rental history page
Contact support if you have any questions

returnRequested.title: Return Request Submitted Successfully
returnRequested.message: Your return request has been sent to the owner.
steps: Wait for owner's review
Prepare item for return
Track return status on this page
Contact owner via chat if you have issues
